name: 10Pearls
overview: 10Pearls is an award-winning, mobile application, outsourced product and enterprise software development company, with clients ranging from large corporations to funded start-ups. 10Pearls offers a unique blend of User Experience experts, world-class Architects and Developers, all coming together to help companies with their product strategy and development needs. Mobile expertise includes phones and tablets in all flavors (iOS, Android, Windows, Blackberry, Symbian), and cross-platform development in LAMP (open source), Java, DotNet and Sharepoint. 10Pearls has also delivered highly-scalable solutions built on the Cloud. Clients have the advantage of leveraging global development centers to reduce costs, while working with US-based architects, project managers and user experience experts. As true partners, 10Pearls believes in adding value by delivering high quality results at affordable costs.
